short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With PricesDance browser extension, see Amazon price history BEFORE you buy and track price drops AFTER your order to claim refunds!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon and Amazon sellers hate this tool!

"Was the price raised before the promotion?"
PricesDance extension reveals real-time price history alongside Amazon promotions, helping you uncover whether your favorite holiday deal is genuinely a bargain or just a marketing trick!

"What if the price drops right after you make a purchase?"
PricesDance extension tracks price changes on your purchases, helping you discover if you saved moneyâ€”or if you're eligible for a refund!
